column8:
Churchill is well known for his wit and inspirational speeches that kept Britain going through World War II, my favourite one being ‘fighting on the beaches’.
He was an inspiration to a whole generation, and continues to inspire many today. He is still regarded as one of the best prime ministers of all time. His attitude not to surrender to Nazi Germany lifted the spirit of a nation that was getting tired of war and brought about a great victory against the enemy.
He is a true legend.
column21: There's not much left to say about this great man. Winston Churchill: where would we be without him? Admire the legend with this t-shirt from weadmire.net
